Title: Liekhus Behavior Driven DevExpress XAF
Description: Using the BDD (Behavior Driven Development) techniques of SpecFlow and the EasyTest scriptability of DevExpress XAF (eXpress Application Framework), you can leverage test first style of application development in a speed never though imaginable.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Using the BDD (Behavior Driven Development) techniques of SpecFlow and the EasyTest scriptability of DevExpress XAF (eXpress Application Framework), you can leverage test first style of application development in a speed never though imaginable.

You can follow the progress and sample code using this project at http://www.liekhus.com.

To get started with this application you will need to download and install the following components:
  1. SpecFlow found at http://www.specflow.org
  2. DevExpress eXpress Application Framework (XAF) found at http://http://www.devexpress.com/Products/Index/Frameworks.xml
